item.title: Trolley Problem Memes, Explained
item.description: Several Trolley Problem Memes, Explained You’ve probably heard of the Trolley Problem, if not let me explain. The Trolley Problem, Explained There’s a trolley charging down the tracks. It’s heading towards a path with five people on it. If nothing is done, these people will surely be doomed. GOOD NEWS! There just happens to be a lever which switch the tracks to a different path, thus causing the train to miss five people.
